review_body: Worst purchase ever..Actually I bought this phone during some offers n I guess they send me rejected device as the battery drains drastically without any usage n the phn gets heated up when connected to charging..Already complained the customer care they carried out some tests which are of no use..Im using it I can feel how it's heating n Al other issues but they from the other end says everything is ok..Worst purchase ever..Amazon loosing customers trust..I wish amazon understand this n provide me a refund..

name: tvipinchand
review_body: Hello All,If you are interested in Buying a Honor 9N this will be useful.I am writing this review after three days of usage.Size:The mobile is so handy, this is the first reason I preferred to buy this mobile. I do not like handsets that are huge sized.Camera:Front Facing camera does a wonderful job even under dim light condition compared to the price of the device.Rear facing camera struggles a lot to capture good shots even in bright light. I was using a Mi A1 before this may be this made me think in this way.Battery:So far so good, it lasted more than 24 hours with normal social media usage, I am not a pro user to check with games.Build Quality:Built Quality is excellent, gives us a premium feel.Fingerprint and Face-unlockBoth works so good, the response time is comparatively less with the budget phones.Overall ratting would be 3.5/5.I will include comments later on if there is some issues. Stay Tuned.

name: sm rafi
review_body: 128gb at 12k definitely good value for money. Performance - brilliant with high clocked processor. Nice latest trending features.Well built but don't know what they planned regarding battery backup. For me, as a heavy user, my 2 yrs old note4 lasts 25-30 hours in hand but this brand new hot piece drops from 100% to 10% in just 18-20 hours even with power saver on. And exhibits a few degrees of temperature over other phones. Two main solutionless losses to you if u take it:Overheating problem- no one at service centre gonna believe.Bad battery backup- they will compare with cheap china mobiles and prove good.Rest all very nice.

name: Syed Naushad Ahmad
review_body: It's an average phone feature wise... Look wise it deserves 5 star... Issue about this phone is single 4g support.. which means if you are having one jio sim and tries to use data from another sim (non jio) then jio sim will not be working... If you have 2 sim both are jio then 1 sim will be permanently useless... Other things are fine... Night mode camera is something which needs improvement... There is no slow motion option... Phone speed is awesome...

name: Pratham kakkad
review_body: Talking about the phone. The looks are really good and cool.The back cover given is average. The but quality of cover is excellent but the rate of damage is very fast.About camera,Camera is really good but not polished in portrait mode. The sensors of back camera cannot judge the outlines of the model accurately. But this issue can be fixed with a software update. Wishing soon...For battery 3/5The battery discharges quickly and also the charger is very slow.The phone is really very fast to use.
review_title: Overall as per my experience,4/5. A decent phone.

Screen size is quite optimum, and hence quite handy.Finger print scanner: Works perfectly.
